title: 114. Silent Tech for Engaging Your Customers | Restaurant Recovery Series
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Daniel Putterman, the chief executive officer of Kogniz. Kogniz is a cloud-based platform that uses digital cameras to monitor any security breaches and provide real-time recognition technology.
